Class LoadFiles

java.lang.Object
util.LoadFiles
public class LoadFiles extends Object
Utility class responsible for loading all CSV files into the system's repositories.

This includes:

  • Student accounts
  • Career staff accounts
  • Company representative accounts
  • Company representative account creation requests
  • Internship opportunities (with deserialized application lists)
  • Internship withdrawal requests

All CSV files are expected to follow the formats defined by the project. This class is typically called at system startup to populate the repositories before any operations begin.

  • Method Details

    • loadCSVs

      public void loadCSVs(UserRepository users, RequestRepository requests, OpportunityRepository opportunities)
      Loads all required CSV files into the corresponding repositories.
      Parameters:
      users - the repository storing user accounts
      requests - the repository storing account creation and withdrawal requests
      opportunities - the repository storing internship opportunities

    • loadStudentCSV

      public void loadStudentCSV(UserRepository userRepository)
      Loads student accounts from data/student_list.csv into the UserRepository.

      Each row is delegated to UserFactory to parse and construct a Student object.

      Parameters:
      userRepository - the repository where students will be added

    • loadCareerStaffCSV

      public void loadCareerStaffCSV(UserRepository userRepository)
      Loads career staff accounts from data/staff_list.csv.
      Parameters:
      userRepository - the repository where staff accounts will be added

    • loadCompanyRepCSV

      public void loadCompanyRepCSV(UserRepository userRepository)
      Loads company representative accounts from data/company_rep_list.csv.
      Parameters:
      userRepository - the repository where company reps will be added

    • loadCompanyRepReqCSV

      public void loadCompanyRepReqCSV(RequestRepository requestRepository)
      Loads company representative account creation requests from data/company_rep_req_list.csv.
      Parameters:
      requestRepository - the repository where the requests will be stored

    • loadOpportunityCSV

      public void loadOpportunityCSV(OpportunityRepository opportunityRepository)
      Loads internship opportunities from data/internship_opps.csv, including deserialization of any stored application lists.
      Parameters:
      opportunityRepository - the repository where opportunities will be added

    • loadWithdrawalRequestCSV

      public void loadWithdrawalRequestCSV(RequestRepository requestRepository)
      Loads internship withdrawal requests from data/withdrawal_req_list.csv.
      Parameters:
      requestRepository - the repository where withdrawal requests will be stored
